Young Adult

Reviews, recommendations, posts and ideas for and by young adults.

Eden Summer by Liz Flanagan

Written by Ella Gorman · Published Aug 1, 2017

Ella found Eden Summer an intriguing story that shows the value of true friendship

New Young Adult books for August 2017

Written by Jo Dixon · Published Jul 31, 2017

New titles from Joseph Delaney, Tom Ellen & Lucy Ivison and Emery Lord

Stargazing for Beginners by Jenny McLachlan

Written by Kate Ashton · Published Jul 25, 2017

Stargazing for Beginners is a brilliant and delightful book that entertains throughout.

Straight Outta Nerdsville (The Private Blog of Joe Cowley #4) by Ben Davis

Written by Kate Ashton · Published Jul 18, 2017

Straight Outta Nerdsville is a funny and entertaining quick read.

Release by Patrick Ness

Written by Kate Ashton · Published Jul 13, 2017

Patrick Ness weaves a complex, emotional and compelling tale.

Zoella and Friends Book Club list 2017

Written by Sophie Green · Published Jul 12, 2017

8 titles for 2017 chosen by vlogger Zoella (aka Girl Online author Zoe Sugg) and friends

Straight Outta Crongton by Alex Wheatle

Written by Rachael Vickery · Published Jul 11, 2017

Straight Outta Crongton is a heart wrenching story of betrayal and revenge set in a run-down council neighbourhood.

Same Difference by Siobhan Vivian

Written by Emma Maguire · Published Jul 6, 2017

Emma recommends Same Difference to readers trying to find their place in the world.

New Young Adult books for July 2017

Written by Jo Dixon · Published Jun 29, 2017

New titles from Lisa Heathfield, Dyan Sheldon, Patrice Lawrence and more

Stranger Than Fanfiction by Chris Colfer

Written by Emily Mitchell · Published Jun 13, 2017

Stranger Than Fanfiction is a humorous and touching exploration of celebrity culture.

About our Young Adult section

Book reviews, reading suggestions and blog posts from our staff and young adult readers. Want to write for our website? Email us at help@suffolklibraries.co.uk.
